div.div: Univ. of La Verne vs. Whitworth
at Spokane, Wash. | Whitworth Pine Bowl

tr.td: Whitworth won the toss and elected to recieve
Alex Miller kickoff 55 yards to the WHTW10, Degaetano return 21 yards to the WHTW31 (Christian Lozon).
Tripoli rush for 5 yards to the WHTW36 (Blayr Stone).
PENALTY WHTW false start (Cosby, K.) 5 yards to the WHTW31.
